PASSED_VALIDATION_MESSAGE:
You will now enter the next phase of the experiment.

Press the Continue button to proceed.
FAILED_VALIDATION_MESSAGE:
Unfortunately, you are not eligible for this experiment.
Please find your experimenter, and let them know.
CALIBRATION_PART_1_DIRECTIONS:
Calibration Part 1 is the same task as the practice section.
You will place your pinky on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_0}} key
2. Place your ring finger on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_1}} key
3. Place your middle finger on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_2}} key
4. While still holding down with these fingers, simultaneously, when you see the GO!, tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key, repeatedly with your index finger as fast as you can!

Note:
Do not tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key until the GO! appears and do not release the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_0}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_1}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_2}} until prompted.
CALIBRATION_SECTION_MESSAGE:
The next phase of the experiment is the Calibration section consisting of 3 parts.
Press the Continue button and follow the instructions.
ADDITIONAL_CALIBRATION_PART_1_DIRECTIONS:
You will now perform additional calibrations tasks. The task is the same as the section you just completed

Please ensure you are tapping the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key as fast as you can, repeatedly, when the GO! appears.

During the trial, remember to continue holding the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_0}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_1}}, and {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_2}} until told to release them.
Do not tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key until the GO! appears.

Press the Continue button to begin.
CALIBRATION_PART_1_ENDING_MESSAGE:
You will now enter the next phase of the experiment.

Press the Continue button to proceed.
TRIAL_BLOCKS_DIRECTIONS:
During this next phase of the experiment, you will have the choice to accept or skip a trial.

You may either accept a trial with the Left Arrow on your keyboard
Or
You may skip the trial with the Right Arrow on your keyboard

The required target area will be shown in blue and corresponding reward will be shown during the decision phase.
If you accept the trial and the red bar ends in the target area, you will receive the reward designated in the experiment.

Before a set of trials begins, you will have a set of practice trials to familiarize yourself.

Press the Continue button to proceed.
CALIBRATION_PART_2_ENDING_MESSAGE:
You will now enter the next phase of the experiment.

Press the Continue button to proceed.
CALIBRATION_FINISHED_DIRECTIONS: You have finished the first set of trials... INSERT MORE HERE
LIKERT_PREAMBLE: During this last block of trials, how would you respond to the following question?
LIKERT_PREAMBLE_DEMO: During this last block of demo trials, how would you respond to the following question?
FAILED_MINIMUM_DEMO_TAPS_MESSAGE: You did not tap enough during the last practice trial. Please try again.
KEY_TAPPED_EARLY_MESSAGE: Key was tapped too early. Please wait for the appropriate time to press the key.
REWARD_TOTAL_MESSAGE: Total reward for successful trials is: CHF {{totalSuccessfulReward}}. Press the Continue button to proceed to the next block of trials.
EXPERIMENT_BEGIN_MESSAGE:
Welcome to the experiment. Please follow the directions.
Press Continue to begin.
NO_STIMULI_VIDEO_TUTORIAL_MESSAGE:
The video below demonstrates how the practice will be performed.

1. You will place your pinky on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_0}} key
2. Place your ring finger on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_1}} key
3. Place your middle finger on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_2}} key
4. While still holding down with these fingers, simultaneously, when you see the GO!, tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key, repeatedly with your index finger as fast as you can!

Note:
Do not tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key until the GO! appears and do not release the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_0}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_1}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_2}} until prompted.
After clicking the Continue button, you will complete 3 practice trials.
STIMULI_VIDEO_TUTORIAL_MESSAGE:
Get the red bar as high as possible with your taps!
Do not tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key until the GO! appears.

The video below demonstrates how the next section of the experiment will be performed.
Click Continue after watching the video
VALIDATION_VIDEO_TUTORIAL_MESSAGE:
Get the red bar in the target area with your taps!
Do not tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key until the GO! appears.
The video below demonstrates how the next section of the experiment will be performed.
Click Continue after watching the video
INTERACTIVE_KEYBOARD_TUTORIAL_MESSAGE:
PRACTICE
On your physical keyboard:
1. You will place your pinky on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_0}} key
2. Place your ring finger on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_1}} key
3. Place your middle finger on the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_2}} key
4. While still holding down with these fingers, simultaneously, when you see the GO!, tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key, repeatedly with your index finger as fast as you can!

Note:
Do not tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key until the GO! appears and do not release the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_0}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_1}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_2}} until prompted.
DEMO_TRIAL_MESSAGE:
The next {{NUM_DEMO_TRIALS}} trials you will complete are demo trials.
The feedback you receive on the display when the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} is tapped will be the same as in the next {{NUM_TRIALS}} that you will complete.

Attempt to finish the trial with the red bar in between the targets displayed.

Note:
Do not tap the {{KEY_TO_PRESS}} key until the GO! appears and do not release the {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_0}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_1}}, {{KEYS_TO_HOLD_2}} until prompted.
ACCEPTANCE_TRIAL_MESSAGE:
The target height and reward are shown above.

Press the Left Arrow on your keyboard to accept the trial
Or
Press the Right Arrow on your keyboard to skip the trial
COUNTDOWN_TIMER_MESSAGE: The next part of the experiment will begin in:

LIKERT_SURVEY_1_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_1: I felt I was in control of the bar's movement.

LIKERT_SURVEY_2_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_1: It was difficult to work out what I had to do to complete the task successfully
LIKERT_SURVEY_2_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_2: I found it difficult to keep my mind on the task
LIKERT_SURVEY_2_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_3: I set myself the goal to perform the task better
LIKERT_SURVEY_2_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_4: I felt that I needed a push to continue tapping until the end of the task
LIKERT_SURVEY_2_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_5: I feel motivated to continue the task

END_EXPERIMENT_MESSAGE: Press Continue to end the Experiment and then, please, find your experimenter.
TUTORIAL_INTRODUCTION_MESSAGE:
The first part of the experiment will consist of 2 different sections:

1. Practice section so you can acclimate to the task you will be performing.
2. Calibration section to personalize the experiment to you

Follow the instructions throughout each section carefully.
Press the Continue button to begin.
EXPERIMENT_HAS_ENDED_MESSAGE: The experiment has now ended. Please find your experimenter and let them know.
LIKERT_INTRO: You will now answer a few questions. Press Continue to proceed.
